title: Lee Van Cleef | The Big Combo 1955 (Film-Noir, Crime) Colorized Full Movie

sources.title: Lee Van Cleef | The Big Combo 1955 (Film-Noir, Crime) Colorized Full Movie
sources.description:
In the world of crime, Justice has a high price.

The relentless police lieutenant Leonard Diamond is determined to bring down a cunning crime kingpin, Mr Brown.  But navigating a treacherous path of corruption, betrayal and obsession,  will he risk everything for the truth & justice?

Original title: The Big Combo 1955

Black & White version:  https://youtu.be/OITrTnAqWI8


Director: Joseph H. Lewis
Writer: Philip Yordan
Stars: Lee Van Cleef, Cornel Wilde, Richard Conte, Jean Wallace
Genres: Crime, Drama, Film-Noir, Thriller

00:00 Full Movie
01:49 A police officer named Leonard is determined to bring down a criminal organization led by Mr. Brown, but struggles to gather evidence and convince his superiors to support him.
09:53 Mr. Brown's girlfriend, Susan, attempts suicide and is arrested for homicide.
20:52 A police lieutenant interrogates Mr. Brown about a woman named Alicia.
22:47 A conversation between two individuals about false arrests and a missing person leads to a revelation about a potential connection between a hoodlum and a closed case.
38:06 Lt. Diamond interrogates a man named Bettini in order to gather information about Brown and his associates.
41:17 Lt Diamond investigates the mysterious disappearance of Alicia Brown and uncovers a possible murder plot.
48:11 A man named Mr. Diamond confronts Joe Brown about his ruthless actions and urges him to leave his organization.
56:54 Mr. Diamond learns about Miss Lowell's complicated relationship with Mr. Brown and her desire to change her life.
1:05:40 Alicia is alive and living in Sicily, disproving the murder theory
1:15:08 A witness against Mr. Brown reveals his crimes and the police investigate the murders.
1:19:52 Criminals plan a heist, but things go wrong and they must figure out who betrayed them.

@CultCinemaClassics
